eventName: Ideal City: Carnival in the Endless Summer
storyInfo: Stitch's friends want to give him the courage to confront the dome and leave with no regrets, and they strive every which way to make it happen.

attributes.content: Attention all residents of Zeruertza. It's a fine day.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: The results of Master Edge's survey have just been made available.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: The active Originium vein is set to explode in approximately 25 days.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Zeruertza is officially entering the preparatory phase of evacuation, commencing now.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Following discussions between your representatives, a general meeting will be held at a suitable timeslot in the forum.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: At that time, we will discuss the specifics of our evacuation program, as well as the dressing of our doomed city.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Residents of Zeruertza, stay tuned for further broadcasts.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Deculture. Wake up, Deculture.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: ...good boy, Robot Stitch.
attributes.name: A Sleeping Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...Deculture. Deculture.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You're so silly, Robot Catch.
attributes.name: A Sleeping Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Let's have the both of you fight.
attributes.name: A Sleeping Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: What in all of love are you dreaming about?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: DECULTURE! WAKE UP!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Hmnuh? Whazzwha?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You know... I'd like to ask why you're taking a nap in Stitch's garden again.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Because it's so peaceful here.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You must have missed the broadcast as well, seeing how cold you were out.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Did something happen?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Master Edge went to the other shore, did his survey, and found an Originium vein got shifted close to the tunnel entrance by the earthquake from before, and it's shockingly active too.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: We're going to hold a general meeting, and decide on how we take refuge.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You didn't come here just to tell me that, though, did you?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm looking for Stitch.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: If you want Stitch, I think he's ridden the boat I lent him to the other shore, to meet Master Edge and the others.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Really? I'll wait for him here, then.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Do you need him for something?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Yes. I'm hoping... he'll return to the design department and work with us in amending the dome plans.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Since Zeruertza's facing destruction, there's no sense in holding the landmark competition anymore, but we're lucky to still have some time.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: So, we'll have to make a decision at the meeting regarding how to handle that hole the earthquake left in the dome.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I dunno, just leaving it sounds fine to me. Thoughts?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Even if we wanted to, we'd need the citizens to approve that first.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: It's an extremely significant thing to any architectural designer, letting a city reach perfection during its final moments.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: We're giving the city a final round of observation, and putting out a plan we can fulfil in the finite time we have.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: So, you're hoping Stitch will return.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I don't know why Master Finch left, all of a sudden. Others might believe their tutor-apprentice relationship was fading, or their time was just up, but I know that can't be the case.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: As a former assistant to Master Finch, I know more than anyone that despite his personal utter lack of inhibition, he cared very much for Stitch, from the bottom of his heart.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Stitch was like a son to him.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: So his departure has to have some inextricable link to Stitch.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: And as industrial representative, you've seen the state Stitch has fallen into since his teacher left.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: His planning proposals kept getting overruled to the point he's slowly stopped showing up at the design department, and I've been seeing it happen and wanting to help him somehow, but I've never been able to find a way.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: This dome was left to the city as the grandest work of Stitch's teacher, Master Finch.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But do you think, to Stitch, it might instead be a burden?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Even so, you don't want him left with any regrets, right?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: This is our last chance, Deculture.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: How very you.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Stitch, Stitch! Are you there?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Huh? What are you two doing here?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Catch! So you and Deculture got something going on, huh?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No we don't.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Wow, ice-cold.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Keep me out of your banter, Elysium.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Master Edge, Miss Gavial, good work.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I'm just napping here, and he's waiting for Stitch to come back.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You're saying Stitch hasn't?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Didn't he bring you and your friends the equipment? And he made kind of a whole scene about it.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But he vanished partway, and we don't know where he went, and here it turns out he's not home.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Tomimi ran into the runt, and said he looked pretty damned unhappy.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Any ideas?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I... don't know.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...I might.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Zumama. Zumama. Not in this row, either.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Okay, move onto the next.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Ugh, this is tiring me out, a little.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I can't believe we still haven't found it.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Go on, take a break.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: About my earlier question—I'd still like to know why, Zumama.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I can't imagine you've been blind to how fine life is among the Durins.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: There's no noble conspiracies, no scheming and jockeying—and even if there is, it's just plain adorable.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Even as we're on the verge of calamity, the Durins have sufficient contingency plans in place, and they even have the leisure at this moment to consider—
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: How Zeruertza can greet its destruction in the best condition they can imagine.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I'm not denying any of that, Avdotya.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I think you're pretty on point. Durin life's not bad.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'm not refusing you because I think what you're saying is wrong, it's because... I don't like it.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: If there was a Tiacauh who wanted to come live underground, then I wouldn't stop them, and neither would Inam.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But why? I'm not just rejecting surface life out of my own experiences.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I've thought over this countless times, spending my days in the Durin cities.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I believe, and results show, the Durins live an undoubtedly better life, one more in pursuit of culture.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But why would you, or Gavial, or anyone not want a better life?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: My master isn't just wildly proficient with machines. She's really into movies, and dramas too.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She gets me watching all sorts of stuff, and she doesn't even care if I'm interested—she explains it all to me. I've ended up remembering a few things, over time.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: For example, when she sees a character about to go on a long speech, she always says—
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: 'Ugh, long-winded righteous guys like this either turn out as villains, or they just get in the protag's way. Can't they just make their characters a little cuter...?'
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Why do you need to convince me, or Gavial?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, and might I add, young lady, your view of the Durins is actually quite wide of the mark.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If you'd said life in the Durin city-states was more 'on-demand,' or 'cozier,' or 'safer' of a life, I wouldn't retort.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: But you hold that the Durin lifestyle is a 'better' life, and dare I say, that alone may well be wrong.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: You're a clever child. I'm sure the distinction there doesn't fly past you.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Good sir... I—I'm calling you that for now. I understand what you mean.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But can you really say it's wrong for me to wish for others to live a more materially, spiritually plentiful life?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That's a different question. You're simply looking to redeem a little of the prestige you lost in an argument that's long since ended, no?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: So basically, you think the pressure to Stitch's mind, so he chose to run?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: And if so, my bet is he's gone to a hut by the lakeside.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Before he moved into this building, that was where he and his teacher lived together.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Catch, you know what I want to say here, don't you?
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: If we end up deciding to amend the dome design, and Stitch is still unwilling, then it's down to me, right?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: It's not just for the sake of dressing the city. From a realistic standpoint, reinforcing the dome'll buy us more time to evacuate.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Finch and I were good friends, and I couldn't make sense of him leaving without a word either, so I'd been wanting to look after his student as best I could.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: There's a boundary to everything.
attributes.name: Edge Eartheart

attributes.content: Miss Gavial... can we trouble you to go find Stitch?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You didn't need to ask—I was gonna. Tomimi volunteered to help the city people out with stuff, and having an empty plate bugged me.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I think him and I have a little debt to settle at this point, too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Then I'll leave it to you.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Where's that hut?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Just on the lakeside, similar style to this building. Very unique. You'll see it the moment you get there.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You got it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Catch, aren't you gonna go?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I... I don't know how I should face Stitch, under these circumstances.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But you're worried sick for him, aren't you?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ever since Master Finch vanished, I've been wanting to help him, but I just don't know how.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: C'mon. Do I diagnose you with 'too nice,' or 'way way way too nice?'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Nah, I guess you Durins do give me that kind of vibe, on the whole.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: For reasons I don't know either, Stitch actually has kind of an inferiority thing.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: With his type of personality? You greet him with what you think is an equal approach, but to him, it actually comes off like a sort of pressure from on high.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Because for him, it takes everything he's got just to pretend he's on the same level as you guys.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You can't just invest some sincerity and expect results when it comes to communicating.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: So, what should I do?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Well, alright. You treat me like a brother, in times like these, I'll teach you a thing or two, just how brothers should.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's actually real simple. You don't say anything like 'I want a fair competition with you,' and you don't say to him, 'you've got a choice.'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You seal off his escape route, and you tell him, 'you've got no choice, but I'll be right there with you, and we'll do our best.'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: A man who spends too long shut in his own self-made space tends to need a little prodding, from time to time.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Miss Deculture, what do you say?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Why ask me?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I'm just making some of my own guesses here, but you, you clearly know him better than anyone.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Stitch does have a sort of inferiority complex.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You might just be right. He doesn't need tender comfort, he needs someone to really yank him out.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Won't that... hurt him?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: It will, and it's not guaranteed to turn out pretty.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But if this is his last chance, as you say—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Then you ask yourself too, do you just want to get along better with him, or do you want him to make his way out, even if it makes your relationship worse?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Then I think you oughta speed it up.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Or we get Gavial's fists instead, and those sure don't settle for 'yank him out.'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Haha, I'll get going now, then!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Lively, extroverted, grasps social contact. They're all fine character traits, Catch.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: You believe people should become that way, and you do work to see that happen.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But you can't always hope for everyone else to be like you.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Elysium's right too, and if I'm going to help Stitch, maybe that's what I need to do.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But I think distress and evasion are just as correct, too.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Catch, seeing as you're going to do things your way, I'll do things my way.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: If Stitch wants to run, I'll help him run.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Deculture. Deculture. Do you need us?
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Go. Help Stitch out.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: If Miss Deculture wasn't doing it on purpose, then she doesn't realize just how easy it actually is to read her face.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: She doesn't agree with what I say at all, heheh.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Man—I haven't felt this youthful a vibe in forever. It makes me wanna join in on the fun a little.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Nah. If I did go, I might just get swept in by Gavial.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't want to be beaten for no good reason.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Okay, Stitch! You'd better shake up and wake up.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Turn a blind eye to all these guys who want to help you, and you don't know how it might come back to haunt you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't understand. You people clearly aren't as unreasonable as Gavial.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Why do you insist so much on—
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Indulging her?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I ask you, do you not look at Gavial and feel that we need someone like her?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Inam, weren't you waiting outside?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You spent so long in here, I thought you were up to something...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Avdotya, you and I happen to be similar in ways.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: A huge part of why I came to serve as Acahualla's Messenger was that I wanted to escape the unending strife between the lords ameer.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Acahualla has nothing to speak of, but life here is extremely comfortable. I'm a big fan of this land.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: And also, if we're raising worries, then I'm more worried than you about the Durins' showing up causing issues.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Then why are you still...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Gavial's been gone from Acahualla for so many years, and hasn't changed one bit.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: As if nothing, anywhere, across all the four corners could make her surrender.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: When I see Gavial, I think to myself, 'ah—so people like you still exist.'
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I can't help but want to help her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It's that simple.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Before I left Acahualla with Gavial, I was completely ignorant.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I've seen so many things with Rhodes Island, but I've slowly realized that what I'm really learning isn't just knowledge.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: There's so much across the world that I've never thought of, that at the same time is exactly how you should expect.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I'm sure Gavial's seen plenty where she's just as powerless too.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: My dream is to build the mightiest machine in any land.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But truth is, I still haven't figured out what I should use it for when I'm done.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Still, seeing Gavial, I've gradually gotten some sort of idea.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: The machines I make will be used to help her.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: There'll come a day when Gavial's fists meet a wall they can't break through.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But that's not a problem with her. She's flesh and blood too, after all.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: And just like I've done here and now, I'll give her the greatest weapon.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: If fists won't do it, then take an axe. If an axe won't do it, then take a hammer. If a hammer won't do it, then take a drill. If a drill won't do it, then I'll build her an entire Big, Ugly Thing.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: And if a Big Ugly won't do it, then I'll build her a nomadic city, and whatever she wants to do with that, she will.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You really trust her that much?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I do. Because Gavial stands for Acahualla better than anyone or anything ever could.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: She's the backbone of us, and in future, she'll be the backbone of even more.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: And it's in our power, our own power, to make sure Gavial's fists are unhindered for eternity.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Of course, realistically, I'm just as worried what leaving Acahualla to her purview will result in.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: With Gavial's temperament, giving her authority might discomfort the powers more than it will her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: So, if she really was going to serve as lord ameer, I was planning to thoroughly groom her for it for a stretch.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It probably wouldn't have done anything.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Haha, I think so too.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: But even I never pictured I'd be willing to go so far for her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Your experiences have taught you to doubt people like Gavial from the start.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I don't deny that.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So, maybe you can try to start by believing in her.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: ...I'll give it an attempt.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So. The map?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Ah... I forgot.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, I see you left it to this old codger and all these bots to actually, conscientiously search, while you were all tied up arguing in Gavial's favor.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: And I only just realized this shelf has absolutely nothing to do with travel records!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: So I went to the other side and took a look, and I found it straight away.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I think it's this we want?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Avdotya: dummy. Avdotya.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Fine... I know, I was wrong, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Is that enough?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Ah, Avdotya! Brilliant, you're still here.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Master Edge sent a message a moment ago. He's proposing we hold that general meeting in the forum now, and the other representatives are all in favor. Now we need your view.
attributes.name: Croque Diamondface

attributes.content: Thank you, Zumama.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Though I still don't entirely accept it, perhaps—I can indeed give it an attempt.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Croque, tell Master Edge—I have no objections, and moreover, I'll be there to persuade the residents of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Avdotya
